about_the_game:
Welcome to Relax City, a bustling metropolis where everything was perfect—until you arrived! The moment you start the game, all the colors in the world disappear, plunging the city into a monochromatic mystery. The vibrant hues of red, green, and blue have been hidden throughout the city.

Your Mission:

Embark on an exciting adventure to retrieve the lost color balls of red, green, and blue. Explore the city's nooks and crannies, solve intriguing puzzles, and overcome challenges to restore the brilliant colors of Relax City.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Exploration: Navigate through a beautifully designed cityscape turned grayscale, uncovering hidden secrets.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Test your wits with puzzles that unlock new areas and lead you closer to the color balls.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Experience a blend of exploration, strategy, and action as you progress on your quest.

  • Visual Transformation: Witness the city's transformation from monochrome back to vibrant colors as you retrieve each color ball.

  • Relaxing Atmosphere: Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and serene environments designed to provide a calming gaming experience.

Are you ready to bring the colors back to Relax City? Your adventure awaits!
